dict.acceptation: 瞬间，顷刻；此刻；当月；速食食品，即溶饮料；
立即的；迫切的；正在考虑的，目前的；即食的；

sent.orig: They are quite good at cooking: instant noodles, instant rice, instant cereal, of course.
sent.trans: 他们善于烹饪：方便面，速食米饭，速容麦片等。

sent.orig: Instant foods, instant communication, faster transportation-all of se recent developments are designed to save time.
sent.trans: 快餐、实时通讯、高速运输，所有这些最新发展都是为了节省人们的时间。

sent.orig: Along with instant coffee, ramen marked the beginning of the age of the instant food.
sent.trans: 泡面(ramen)和即溶咖啡(instantcoffee)一起，标志着速食时代的开端。

sent.orig: Instant noodles, instant dishes and refreshments are all for people's convenience.
sent.trans: 方便面、方便菜、方便点心，为的是方便百姓。

sent.orig: Instant Runway Stand Instant Air coagulation, and time is grid, As if the earth stopped rotating.
sent.trans: 刹那间跑道看台刹那间，空气凝固了，时间被定格，地球仿佛停止了转动。
